quote.text: She was powerful not because she wasnâ€™t scared but because she went on so strongly, despite the fear.
quote.author: Atticus Poetry

scripture.text: The Lord thy God in the midst of thee is mighty; he will save, he will rejoice over thee with joy; he will rest in his love, he will joy over thee with singing.
